00126 typedef KindStringMap::value_type  KindStringMapEntry;
00127 KindStringMapEntry kindStringMapEntries[] =
00128   {
00129     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_CHAR,   "PyArray_CHAR"),
00130     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_UBYTE,  "PyArray_UBYTE"),
00131     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_SBYTE,  "PyArray_SBYTE"),
00132     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_SHORT,  "PyArray_SHORT"),
00133     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_INT,    "PyArray_INT"),
00134     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_LONG,   "PyArray_LONG"),
00135     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_FLOAT,  "PyArray_FLOAT"),
00136     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_DOUBLE, "PyArray_DOUBLE"),
00137     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_CFLOAT, "PyArray_CFLOAT"),
00138     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_CDOUBLE,"PyArray_CDOUBLE"),
00139     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_OBJECT, "PyArray_OBJECT"),
00140     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_NTYPES, "PyArray_NTYPES"),
00141     KindStringMapEntry(PyArray_NOTYPE ,"PyArray_NOTYPE")

00160 typedef KindTypeMap::value_type  KindTypeMapEntry;
00161 KindTypeMapEntry kindTypeMapEntries[] =
00162   {
00163     KindTypeMapEntry('c',PyArray_CHAR),
00164     KindTypeMapEntry('b',PyArray_UBYTE),
00165     KindTypeMapEntry('1',PyArray_SBYTE),
00166     KindTypeMapEntry('s',PyArray_SHORT),
00167     KindTypeMapEntry('i',PyArray_INT),
00168     KindTypeMapEntry('l',PyArray_LONG),
00169     KindTypeMapEntry('f',PyArray_FLOAT),
00170     KindTypeMapEntry('d',PyArray_DOUBLE),
00171     KindTypeMapEntry('F',PyArray_CFLOAT),
00172     KindTypeMapEntry('D',PyArray_CDOUBLE),
00173     KindTypeMapEntry('O',PyArray_OBJECT)
00174   };
00175 
00176   
00177 int numStringEntries = sizeof(kindStringMapEntries)/sizeof(KindStringMapEntry);
00178 int numCharEntries = sizeof(kindCharMapEntries)/sizeof(KindCharMapEntry);
00179 int numTypeEntries = sizeof(kindTypeMapEntries)/sizeof(KindTypeMapEntry);

00182 using namespace boost::python;
00183   
00184 static KindStringMap kindstrings(kindStringMapEntries,
00185                                    kindStringMapEntries + numStringEntries);
00186 
00187 static KindCharMap kindchars(kindCharMapEntries,
00188                                    kindCharMapEntries + numCharEntries);
00189 
00190 static KindTypeMap kindtypes(kindTypeMapEntries,
00191                                    kindTypeMapEntries + numTypeEntries);

00193 //Create a numarray referencing Python sequence object
00194 numeric::array makeNum(object x){
00195   if (!PySequence_Check(x.ptr())){
00196     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a sequence");
00197     throw_error_already_set();
00198   }
00199   object obj(handle<>
00200              (PyArray_ContiguousFromObject(x.ptr(),PyArray_NOTYPE,0,0)));
00201   check_PyArrayElementType(obj);
00202   return extract<numeric::array>(obj); 
00203 }
00204 
00205 //Create a one-dimensional Numeric array of length n and Numeric type t
00206 numeric::array makeNum(intp n, PyArray_TYPES t=PyArray_DOUBLE){
00207   object obj(handle<>(PyArray_FromDims(1, &n, t)));
00208   return extract<numeric::array>(obj);
00209 }
00210   
00211 //Create a Numeric array with dimensions dimens and Numeric type t
00212 numeric::array makeNum(std::vector<intp> dimens, 
00213                        PyArray_TYPES t=PyArray_DOUBLE){
00214   object obj(handle<>(PyArray_FromDims(dimens.size(), &dimens[0], t)));
00215   return extract<numeric::array>(obj);
00216 }
00217 
00218 numeric::array makeNum(const numeric::array& arr){
00219   //Returns a reference of arr by calling numeric::array copy constructor.
00220   //The copy constructor increases arr's reference count.
00221   return numeric::array(arr);
00222 }

00224 PyArray_TYPES type(numeric::array arr){
00225   return PyArray_TYPES(PyArray_TYPE(arr.ptr()));
00226 }
00227 
00228 void check_type(boost::python::numeric::array arr, 
00229                 PyArray_TYPES expected_type){
00230   PyArray_TYPES actual_type = type(arr);
00231   if (actual_type != expected_type) {
00232     std::ostringstream stream;
00233     stream << "expected Numeric type " << kindstrings[expected_type]
00234            << ", found Numeric type " << kindstrings[actual_type] << std::ends;
00235     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, stream.str().c_str());
00236     throw_error_already_set();
00237   }
00238   return;
00239 }
00240 
00241 //Return the number of dimensions
00242 int rank(numeric::array arr){
00243   //std::cout << "inside rank" << std::endl;
00244   if(!PyArray_Check(arr.ptr())){
00245     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a PyArrayObject");
00246     throw_error_already_set();
00247   }
00248   return PyArray_NDIM(arr.ptr());
00249 }
00250 
00251 void check_rank(boost::python::numeric::array arr, int expected_rank){
00252   int actual_rank = rank(arr);
00253   if (actual_rank != expected_rank) {
00254     std::ostringstream stream;
00255     stream << "expected rank " << expected_rank 
00256            << ", found rank " << actual_rank << std::ends;
00257     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, stream.str().c_str());
00258     throw_error_already_set();
00259   }
00260   return;
00261 }
00262 
00263 intp size(numeric::array arr)
00264 {
00265   if(!PyArray_Check(arr.ptr())){
00266     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a PyArrayObject");
00267     throw_error_already_set();
00268   }
00269   return PyArray_Size(arr.ptr());
00270 }
00271 
00272 void check_size(boost::python::numeric::array arr, intp expected_size){
00273   intp actual_size = size(arr);
00274   if (actual_size != expected_size) {
00275     std::ostringstream stream;
00276     stream << "expected size " << expected_size 
00277            << ", found size " << actual_size << std::ends;
00278     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, stream.str().c_str());
00279     throw_error_already_set();
00280   }
00281   return;
00282 }
00283 
00284 std::vector<intp> shape(numeric::array arr){
00285   std::vector<intp> out_dims;
00286   if(!PyArray_Check(arr.ptr())){
00287     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a PyArrayObject");
00288     throw_error_already_set();
00289   }
00290   int* dims_ptr = PyArray_DIMS(arr.ptr());
00291   int the_rank = rank(arr);
00292   for (int i = 0; i < the_rank; i++){
00293     out_dims.push_back(*(dims_ptr + i));
00294   }
00295   return out_dims;
00296 }
00297 
00298 intp get_dim(boost::python::numeric::array arr, int dimnum){
00299   assert(dimnum >= 0);
00300   int the_rank=rank(arr);
00301   if(the_rank < dimnum){
00302     std::ostringstream stream;
00303     stream << "Error: asked for length of dimension ";
00304     stream << dimnum << " but rank of array is " << the_rank << std::ends;
00305     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, stream.str().c_str());       
00306     throw_error_already_set();
00307   }
00308   std::vector<intp> actual_dims = shape(arr);
00309   return actual_dims[dimnum];
00310 }
00311 
00312 void check_shape(boost::python::numeric::array arr, std::vector<intp> expected_dims){
00313   std::vector<intp> actual_dims = shape(arr);
00314   if (actual_dims != expected_dims) {
00315     std::ostringstream stream;
00316     stream << "expected dimensions " << vector_str(expected_dims)
00317            << ", found dimensions " << vector_str(actual_dims) << std::ends;
00318     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, stream.str().c_str());
00319     throw_error_already_set();
00320   }
00321   return;
00322 }
00323 
00324 void check_dim(boost::python::numeric::array arr, int dimnum, intp dimsize){
00325   std::vector<intp> actual_dims = shape(arr);
00326   if(actual_dims[dimnum] != dimsize){
00327     std::ostringstream stream;
00328     stream << "Error: expected dimension number ";
00329     stream << dimnum << " to be length " << dimsize;
00330     stream << ", but found length " << actual_dims[dimnum]  << std::ends;
00331     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, stream.str().c_str());       
00332     throw_error_already_set();
00333   }
00334   return;
00335 }

00337 bool iscontiguous(numeric::array arr)
00338 {
00339   //  return arr.iscontiguous();
00340   return PyArray_ISCONTIGUOUS(arr.ptr());
00341 }
00342 
00343 void check_contiguous(numeric::array arr)
00344 {
00345   if (!iscontiguous(arr)) {
00346     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "expected a contiguous array");
00347     throw_error_already_set();
00348   }
00349   return;
00350 }
00351 
00352 void* data(numeric::array arr){
00353   if(!PyArray_Check(arr.ptr())){
00354     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a PyArrayObject");
00355     throw_error_already_set();
00356   }
00357   return PyArray_DATA(arr.ptr());
00358 }
00359 
00360 //Copy data into the array
00361 void copy_data(boost::python::numeric::array arr, char* new_data){
00362   char* arr_data = (char*) data(arr);
00363   intp nbytes = PyArray_NBYTES(arr.ptr());
00364   for (intp i = 0; i < nbytes; i++) {
00365     arr_data[i] = new_data[i];
00366   }
00367   return;
00368 } 
00369 
00370 //Return a clone of this array
00371 numeric::array clone(numeric::array arr){
00372   object obj(handle<>(PyArray_NewCopy((PyArrayObject*)arr.ptr(),PyArray_CORDER)));
00373   return makeNum(obj);
00374 }
00375 
00376   
00377 //Return a clone of this array with a new type
00378 numeric::array astype(boost::python::numeric::array arr, PyArray_TYPES t){
00379   return (numeric::array) arr.astype(type2char(t));
00380 }
00381 
00382 std::vector<intp> strides(numeric::array arr){
00383   std::vector<intp> out_strides;
00384   if(!PyArray_Check(arr.ptr())){
00385     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "expected a PyArrayObject");
00386     throw_error_already_set();
00387   }
00388   intp* strides_ptr = PyArray_STRIDES(arr.ptr());
00389   intp the_rank = rank(arr);
00390   for (intp i = 0; i < the_rank; i++){
00391     out_strides.push_back(*(strides_ptr + i));
00392   }
00393   return out_strides;
00394 }
00395 
00396 int refcount(numeric::array arr){
00397   return REFCOUNT(arr.ptr());
00398 }
00399 
00400 void check_PyArrayElementType(object newo){
00401   PyArray_TYPES theType=PyArray_TYPES(PyArray_TYPE(newo.ptr()));
00402   if(theType == PyArray_OBJECT){
00403       std::ostringstream stream;
00404       stream << "array elments have been cast to PyArray_OBJECT, "
00405              << "numhandle can only accept arrays with numerical elements" 
00406              << std::ends;
00407       PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, stream.str().c_str());
00408       throw_error_already_set();
00409   }
00410   return;
00411 }
00412 
00413 std::string type2string(PyArray_TYPES t_type){
00414   return kindstrings[t_type];
00415 }
00416 
00417 char type2char(PyArray_TYPES t_type){
00418   return kindchars[t_type];
00419 }
00420 
00421 PyArray_TYPES char2type(char e_type){
00422   return kindtypes[e_type];
00423 }
00424 
00425 template <class T>
00426 inline std::string vector_str(const std::vector<T>& vec)
00427 {
00428   std::ostringstream stream;
00429   stream << "(" << vec[0];
00430 
00431   for(std::size_t i = 1; i < vec.size(); i++){
00432     stream << ", " << vec[i];
00433   }
00434   stream << ")";
00435   return stream.str();
00436 }
00437 
00438 inline void check_size_match(std::vector<intp> dims, intp n)
00439 {
00440   intp total = std::accumulate(dims.begin(),dims.end(),1,std::multiplies<intp>());
00441   if (total != n) {
00442     std::ostringstream stream;
00443     stream << "expected array size " << n
00444            << ", dimensions give array size " << total << std::ends;
00445     PyErr_SetString(PyExc_TypeError, stream.str().c_str());
00446     throw_error_already_set();
00447   }
00448   return;
00449 }
